description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. The opposing team is always coming down on the wrong side of the issues.  It is time to change their minds.  Blast them with your Enticer, rocket them with your Convincer or nuke them with your Paradigm Shifter towards influential dominance.  With Influence, you can change the world.
description.short: The opposing team is always coming down on the wrong side of the issues.  It is time to change their minds.  Blast them with your Enticer, rocket them with your Convincer or nuke them with your Paradigm Shifter towards influential dominance.  With Influence, you can change the world.
